name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Performance Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, leveraging a deep understanding of system efficiency through meticulous performance tuning and concurrency techniques. Proficient in **C/C++**, **SIMD**, **AVX512**, and **LLVM** to optimize and enhance application performance. Skilled in **Python** and **JavaScript**, supporting robust backend services and ensuring seamless integration across diverse platforms, including **Windows** and **Linux**.
Demonstrated expertise in employing threading strategies for improved application concurrency, and adept in using version control tools like **Git** and **Mercurial** to manage code effectively. Proven ability to communicate technical concepts clearly, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver solutions that meet high standards of performance.
Bringing hands-on experience in the healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong background in cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, and comprehensive knowledge of AI/ML frameworks for real-time data processing. Committed to compliance with industry standards, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong familiarity with modern development processes, including CI/CD pipelines. Highly regarded for driving innovation and operational excellence in software engineering.
